enchantment.uniquee.berserk.desc: The lower your Health the higher your Damage
enchantment.uniquee.all.desc: 在基礎鋒利上打磨出來的更高級的銳利
enchantment.uniquee.swift.desc: Grants you more Movement Speed but you consume more Hunger
enchantment.uniquee.sages_blessing.desc: Increases XP but also adds Exhaustion
enchantment.uniquee.ender_eyes.desc: Looking at Endermen keeps them from teleporting and won't make them angry
enchantment.uniquee.focus_impact.desc: The lower your Attack Speed the more Damage you deal
enchantment.uniquee.bone_crusher.desc: Increased Damage and Looting against bare-chested Skeletons
enchantment.uniquee.ranged.desc: Increases Reach but will reduce Mining Speed when the bonus Reach is in use
enchantment.uniquee.treasurers_eyes.desc: With this Enchantment you'll see Special Effects on Entities depending on the Enchantments on it
enchantment.uniquee.swiftblade.desc: The higher your Attack Speed the more Damage you deal
enchantment.uniquee.spartanweapon.desc: You deal bonus magic damage while wielding a Shield
enchantment.uniquee.perpetualstrike.desc: 持續攻擊一個目標將提高傷害
對溫度高的生物群系:緩速目標&攻擊速度增加,對溫度低的生物群系:燒傷目標&造成更多傷害
enchantment.uniquee.momentum.desc: Continued mining will further increase your Mining Speed per Block mined. Accelerates faster with higher levels
enchantment.uniquee.ender_mending.desc: Improved Version of Mending will store exceeding Experience in the Tool. Ender Mending will split it's Experience to every Item that has either Ender Mending or Mending
enchantment.uniquee.smart_ass.desc: Mining Gravel Sand or Logs will break the top block first
enchantment.uniquee.warriorsgrace.desc: 殺掉生物會慢慢修復耐久
enchantment.uniquee.naturesgrace.desc: Standing near Flowers or Leaves will restore Health as long as the Player didnt receive Damage recently
enchantment.uniquee.fastfood.desc: 擊殺動物不會產生掉落物.而是會恢復飽食度
enchantment.uniquee.endermarksmen.desc: Hitting a target with a Bow will replenish Durability and grant your Arrow back
enchantment.uniquee.cloudwalker.desc: Sneaking changes the Mode. When active Player can no longer fall for a while. Consumes Durability while active
enchantment.uniquee.aresblessing.desc: Lethal Damage will be converted into Durability Loss of the Armor yet Fall & Magic Damage will still go through
enchantment.uniquee.alchemistsgrace.desc: Hitting an Enemy or Mining a Block will grant you Potion Effects
enchantment.uniquee.ecological.desc: Standing near Wood(Logs) & Leaves will recover slowly the durability of your tool.
enchantment.uniquee.phoenixs_blessing.de: When died will resurrect you with full Health and Hunger nearby Enemies will burn
enchantment.uniquee.midas_blessing.desc: Shift-Leftclicking an Anvil will consume all of your Gold in your Inventory. Mining an oreGem will consume Gold but double the drops.
enchantment.uniquee.ifrits_grace.desc: Shift-Leftclicking an Anvil will consume all Lava/Magma related Blocks in you Inventory and store it as \"Lava Power\". Mining a Block will consume Lava Power mining an Ore will consume even more. Therefore the Drops will be smelted.
enchantment.uniquee.icarus_aegis.desc: Shift-Leftclicking an Anvil will consume all Feathers in your Inventory Fall Damage by gliding will be negated
enchantment.uniquee.ender_librarian.desc: Shift-rightclicking with a Map will teleport you in a random spot in the Map Treasuremap will teleport you more precise to the Location. The Item will be consumed
enchantment.uniquee.demeters_soul.desc: 用有該附魔的工具潛行右鍵一個作物來標記它，它成熟的時候只會獲得一個產物，但是會自動輸出到你的終界箱裡。（可以取消）
enchantment.uniquee.endest_reap.desc: Deals bonus magic damage for every Reaped Stack. Gains a Stack for every 'higher being'
enchantment.uniquee.pestilences_odium.de: Non-Hostile Entities in your area will be continuously damaged won't drop Loot
enchantment.uniquee.deaths_odium.desc: Dieing while having this Curse in your inventory will cause you to lose a Base HP. Lost Base HP will be granted back as long as this Enchantment is on an active Slot..

tooltip.uniqee.crops.removed.name: 對此農作物 §3關閉]§f自動收割
